text: Max Roustan (born September 29, 1944 in Saint-Julien-les-Rosiers, Gard) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Gard department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:People from Alès Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Senators of Gard
title: Max Roustan
